author: zinkk757
title: 4/5 sweet box
review: i really enjoy the figures and the catapault in this set, but what is it with that spaceship?.  I mean it's just ugly i'm sorry.  I've always been a fan of spyrius but i hate that design.  besides that though, the set is really good and i love the figures.  The box is neat aand worth keeping.  the combo sets were always really cool. overall i would get it for the figures and the catapault, but not the space ship
